lines.name: Replica Alberon's Warpath

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 80 Chaos Damage to Attacks per 80 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"Starving test subject became completely incapable of exerting force.
However, after being fed, he began to poison everything he touched..."

lines.name: Replica Hyrri's Ire

explicitModifiers.text: (12-18) to (231-347) Added Lightning Damage with Wand Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Yes, a catastrophic storm erupted, and yes, they screamed for me
to stop the experiment... but you know how I am with screams."
- Researcher Olesya, on #2999 and the loss of Outpost Eight

lines.name: Craiceann's Carapace

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Crab Skill
Bleeding cannot be inflicted on you
+5 to Maximum number of Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Deep was the First of All.
It was He who conquered the waves,
who stood guard as land rose from sea.

lines.name: Doryani's Prototype

explicitModifiers.text: Armour also applies to Lightning Damage taken from Hits
Lightning Resistance does not affect Lightning Damage taken
Nearby Enemies have Lightning Resistance equal to yours

lines.flavourText:
"This was the first step in some grand design, 
lost to the ages, now ours to decipher." 
- Dominus, High Templar

lines.name: Tukohama's Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems

lines.flavourText:
Tukohama couldn't lose a fight in his fortress,
So he carried his fortress to the fight.

lines.name: Cowl of the Thermophile

explicitModifiers.text: Can have a second Enchantment Modifier

lines.flavourText:
The villagers seared the blight with fire, but it only spread like dancing flames.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

lines.name: Replica Allelopathy

explicitModifiers.text: Wintertide Brand has (20-30)% increased Chill Effect

lines.flavourText:
"There seems to be some innate relationship between the forces of
chaos and cold. Perhaps we should consult an occultist."

lines.name: Ashrend

explicitModifiers.text: (77-150)% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons
-(60-30) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

lines.name: Seven-League Step
lines.flavourText:
"Death can be outrun with these, but beware!
In running from death, you may forget to live."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 202

lines.name: The Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 29 Added Chaos Damage
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 100% of Base Mana Cost

lines.flavourText:
My Soul is your Strength
My Price is your Blood

lines.name: Bubonic Trail

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Death Walk when Equipped
(40-60)% reduced Duration of Elemental Ailments on You while affected by a Rare Abyss Jewel
(24-32)% increased Movement Speed while affected by a Magic Abyss Jewel
(16-24)% increased Reservation Efficiency of Skills while affected by a Unique Abyss Jewel

lines.flavourText: Even the dead serve the Lightless.

lines.name: Kaom's Heart
lines.flavourText:
The warrior who
fears will fall.

lines.name: Cloak of Defiance
lines.flavourText:
When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

lines.name: Replica Restless Ward

explicitModifiers.text: 6% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate (100-140) Life per second per Endurance Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Further research must be done on Prototype #282.
There is power here, if it can be tapped."

lines.name: Cloak of Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 100 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
40% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

lines.name: Lioneye's Remorse

explicitModifiers.text: -25 Physical Damage taken from Projectile Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Marceus' unblemished shield is a testament
to his arrogance... and his fate.

lines.name: The Blood Dance

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
(3-4)% reduced Attack and Cast Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate (0.8-1)% of Life per second per Frenzy Charge
(20-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
(6-30)% increased Damage per Frenzy Charge with Hits against Enemies on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
"Sharks thrash and swirl 
To the pounding drum of their frenzied hearts
As they dance in the waters red."
-Lavianga, Guardian of the Karui Way

lines.name: Abberath's Hooves

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 7 Abberath's Fury when Equipped
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy

lines.flavourText:
The Goat King knew not of war,
of the lands and laws he trampled.
The Goat King knew only joy
at turning life to ash.

lines.name: Inya's Epiphany

explicitModifiers.text:
25% chance that if you would gain Power Charges, you instead gain up to
your maximum number of Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
Though the path we walk is the same,
each journey is different.

lines.name: Chains of Command

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Animate Guardian's Weapon when Animated Guardian Kills an Enemy
10% chance to Trigger Level 18 Animate Guardian's Weapon when Animated Weapon Kills an Enemy
Animated Guardian deals 5% increased Damage per Animated Weapon
Animated Minions' Melee Attacks deal Splash Damage to surrounding targets
Animated Minions' Melee Attacks deal 50% less Splash Damage to surrounding targets

lines.flavourText:
A general may carry his men to greatness, 
or be dragged beneath the mire by their burden.

lines.name: Replica Soul Strike

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Critical Strike Chance with Bows

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (13-18) to (26-32) Physical Damage to Attacks
80% reduced Maximum Recovery per Life Leech
40% increased Maximum total Life Recovery per second from Leech

lines.flavourText:
"The theft of another's vitality is short-lived, but sweet.
It calls to me, bidding me abandon all other pursuits."
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Doedre's Skin

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Blasphemy

Grants Level 20 Summon Doedre's Effigy Skill
Socketed Hex Curse Skills are Triggered by Doedre's Effigy when Summoned
Hexes from Socketed Skills can apply 5 additional Curses

lines.flavourText:
As she was sentenced to death, Doedre was silent.
As she was tied to the stake, Doedre was silent.
As the flames licked away her life, Doedre was silent.
But Wraeclast had not heard the last of her.

lines.name: Loreweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-10) to (14-36) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
When it comes to finding a use for surplus,
a rich man has within himself
boundless creativity.

lines.name: Belly of the Beast
lines.flavourText:
There is no safer place
Than the Belly of the Beast

lines.name: Thousand Ribbons

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Elemental Proliferation
Adds (2-4) to (5-9) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (2-4) to (5-9) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 1 to (4-12) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The night of a thousand ribbons
To remember the day of a thousand flames
When Sarn burned
And was born again

lines.name: The Queen's Hunger

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Level 20 Bone Offering, Flesh Offering or Spirit Offering every 5 seconds
Offering Skills Triggered this way also affect you
(10-12)% chance to Avoid Elemental Damage from Hits during Soul Gain Prevention
Regenerate 200 Energy Shield per second while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
Recover (37-40)% of Mana and Energy Shield when you Focus
1.5% of Evasion Rating is Regenerated as Life per second while Focused
(18-22)% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life while Focused
+(3201-3995) to Armour during Soul Gain Prevention

lines.flavourText:
In their crimson nightmare, the Vaal are still sacrificing themselves to her glory and beauty. 
They stab their own hearts and cry out in ecstasy, only to rise again.

lines.name: Doedre's Tenure
lines.flavourText:
While Doedre lacked Maligaro's sense of style,
she surpassed her master in pure malevolence.

lines.name: The Rat Cage

explicitModifiers.text: 100% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
The truth lies inside every man, if you dig around. 
Many a confession was found in the bowels of Axiom.

lines.name: Ylfeban's Trickery

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Shock Ground when Hit
Adds 1 to (60-80) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
Curse Enemies which Hit you with a random Hex, ignoring Curse Limit

lines.flavourText:
An angry god is one thing, 
but you should really fear a god 
with an unpredictable sense of humour.

lines.name: Soul Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Spell Totem
Inflicts a random Hex on you when your Totems die

lines.flavourText:
The greatest mistakes cause suffering 
long after they have been made

lines.name: Legacy of Fury

explicitModifiers.text:
(30-40)% chance when you Kill a Scorched Enemy to Burn Each surrounding
Enemy for 4 seconds, dealing 8% of the Killed Enemy's Life as Fire Damage per second

lines.flavourText:
All that was loved, all that was hated -
naught remains but ash.

lines.name: Inextricable Fate

explicitModifiers.text: You gain 3 Grasping Vines when you take a Critical Strike
Nearby stationary Enemies gain a Grasping Vine every 0.5 seconds
All Damage inflicts Poison against Enemies affected by at least 3 Grasping Vines
You take (30-50)% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes by Poisoned Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A multitude of beings share a wretched existence
irrevocably bound together in perpetual torture.

lines.name: Death's Oath

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Death Aura when Equipped
1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You take 450 Chaos Damage per second for 3 seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Tears of blood, aching heart,
My dear Isildria must depart.

lines.name: Geofri's Sanctuary
lines.flavourText:
Faith does not make us invulnerable.
It makes us immortal.

lines.name: Lightning Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (20-30) Lightning Damage to Attacks
50% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
"There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

lines.name: Bubonic Trail

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Death Walk when Equipped
(40-60)% reduced Duration of Elemental Ailments on You while affected by a Rare Abyss Jewel
(24-32)% increased Movement Speed while affected by a Magic Abyss Jewel
(16-24)% increased Reservation Efficiency of Skills while affected by a Unique Abyss Jewel

lines.flavourText: Even the dead serve the Lightless.

lines.name: Kaom's Spirit

explicitModifiers.text: (0.3-0.5)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Life Recovery from Regeneration is not applied

Regenerate 1 Rage per second for every 300 Life Recovery per second from Regeneration
Does not delay Inherent Loss of Rage

lines.flavourText: Who can tell when whispers are truly from a god?

lines.name: Dawnstrider

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Slam Gems are Supported by Level 25 Earthbreaker
(3-5)% of Damage from Hits is taken from your nearest Totem's Life before you

lines.flavourText:
In a void strewn with incandescent stardust,
the emissary of flame traverses interplanetary space
consuming the knowledge of fallen civilisations.

lines.name: Admiral's Arrogance

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% chance that if you would gain Rage on Hit, you instead gain up to your maximum Rage
+(1-3) to Level of all Melee Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
"The long and venerable lineages of the Oriathan nobility tended
to produce Admirals with, shall we say... quick tempers."

lines.name: Shavronne's Wrappings

explicitModifiers.text: 10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

lines.name: Bitterbind Point

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Support Gems
+(5-8)% to Quality of Socketed Support Gems
+(3202-4000) to Armour during Soul Gain Prevention
Gain Arcane Surge when you deal a Critical Strike
Your Raised Spectres also gain Arcane Surge when you do
(40-50)% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance per Raised Spectre

lines.flavourText:
Though we live and act as individuals,
in truth, we are tethered together. 
The barriers that divide us need not be broken 
for our spirits to become entangled.

lines.name: Wilma's Requital

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed apply to Attack Speed

lines.flavourText:
Bold and beautiful, a castaway
Hemmed and hawed, for her to stay
Oh, what I'd give for one more day
For she's the one that got away
-Franklin

lines.name: Breathstealer

explicitModifiers.text: Create a Blighted Spore when your Skills or Minions Kill a Rare Monster

lines.flavourText:
The last gasp is not always one's final act.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

lines.name: Wheel of the Stormsail

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Duration of Curses on you

lines.flavourText: Doomed to plunder forever.

lines.name: Blunderbore

explicitModifiers.text: (50-75)% increased Effect of Shrine Buffs on you
You have Lesser Brutal Shrine Buff
You have Lesser Massive Shrine Buff

lines.flavourText: The giant cares not for the ants.

lines.name: Cherrubim's Maleficence

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

lines.flavourText:
"The Consort of Chaos descended,
swiftly, brutally, artfully, she consumed the living,
leaving naught behind but a Rosemarie bloom,
to celebrate the massacre."
- Blass, explorer, hunter, adventurer

lines.name: Kingsguard

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100 Life when you lose an Endurance Charge

lines.flavourText: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

lines.name: Rise of the Phoenix

explicitModifiers.text: +25% to Fire Resistance while on Low Life
10% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
100% chance to Avoid being Ignited while on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
My bearer shall be guarded by flame,
for I am the phoenix, forever radiant in glory.

lines.name: Shaper's Touch

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
Nothing.

lines.name: Incandescent Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (0.8-1)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

lines.name: Lycosidae

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 250 to 300 Cold Damage to Retaliation Skills

lines.flavourText: A true predator does not chase; It waits.

lines.name: Cospri's Will

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse
Your Hexes can affect Hexproof Enemies
Always Poison on Hit against Cursed Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Curse their vile Council,
They cast me aside as if I am some bastard child.
If they only knew the power I possess.

lines.name: Bramblejack

explicitModifiers.text: -(15-10) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
1000% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker

lines.flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

lines.name: Doedre's Scorn

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
Curse Skills have (30-50)% increased Skill Effect Duration
Adds 37 to 71 Chaos Damage for each Curse on the Enemy

lines.flavourText:
A scar of the flesh you'll never forget,
A scar of the mind you'll never remember.

lines.name: Honourhome

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 30 Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"The craven mind is sharp with self interest.
The honourable mind is much easier to manipulate."
 - Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Jaws of Agony

explicitModifiers.text: -(18-14) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
25% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Throw a Trap

lines.flavourText:
One wrong step triggers destruction. 
Agony slowly dominates the will to live.

lines.name: Rainbowstride
lines.flavourText:
"They say that you should take life's troubles in your stride.
Some men have a longer stride than others."
- Gaius Sentari

lines.name: Steppan Eard

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Movement Speed on Shocked Ground
Regenerate 2% of Life per second on Chilled Ground

lines.flavourText:
To fight an enemy on their lands is a tactical mistake. 
Make those lands your own, and the mistake becomes theirs.

lines.name: The Beast Fur Shawl
lines.flavourText:
The quickest way to understand
your own strengths and weaknesses
is to walk in the skin of another.

lines.name: Voll's Protector

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Although a great leader during the war,
Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

lines.name: Ahn's Contempt

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (8-12)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage while at maximum Power Charges
You take 50% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes while you have no Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
"To touch it is to be overwhelmed with the need to carve your name into history.
A face no one remembers, yet once you have seen it, you will never forget."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 48

lines.name: Memory Vault
lines.flavourText:
Your memories are a bridge to the past.
Let no one cross.

lines.name: Tombfist

explicitModifiers.text: With a Searching Eye Jewel Socketed, Attacks have 25% chance to grant Onslaught On Kill
With a Searching Eye Jewel Socketed, Maim Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks
With a Murderous Eye Jewel Socketed, Intimidate Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks
With a Murderous Eye Jewel Socketed, Melee Hits have 25% chance to Fortify
With a Searching Eye Jewel Socketed, Blind Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit with Attacks
With a Murderous Eye Jewel Socketed, Melee Attacks grant 1 Rage on Hit

lines.flavourText:
"Ever watched a man crush another man's skull?
Hard to feel hope after that."

lines.name: Wreath of Phrecia

explicitModifiers.text: Increases and Reductions to Light Radius also apply to Area of Effect at 50% of their value
Increases and Reductions to Light Radius also apply to Damage

lines.flavourText: The Light drove the darkness from our lands and from our hearts.

lines.name: Beacon of Madness

explicitModifiers.text: All Damage inflicts Poison while affected by Glorious Madness
You have Igniting, Chilling and Shocking Conflux while affected by Glorious Madness
20% chance to deal Double Damage while affected by Glorious Madness
Immune to Elemental Ailments while affected by Glorious Madness
Enemies you Kill while affected by Glorious Madness have a 40% chance to Explode, dealing a quarter of their Life as Chaos Damage
+15 to maximum Fortification while affected by Glorious Madness

lines.flavourText: Nothing spreads as quickly as an idea.

lines.name: Replica Bones of Ullr

explicitModifiers.text: Summoned Phantasms have 10% chance to refresh their Duration when they Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
Summoned Raging Spirits have 10% chance to refresh their Duration when they Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"Outpost Twelve has been abandoned. On the bright side, I expect the plague of apparitions
to serve as ample defence for the relics we left behind." 
- Administrator Qotra

lines.name: Replica Volkuur's Guidance

explicitModifiers.text: Chaos Skills have 20% chance to Ignite

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #73 is a near perfect opposite of the original. Perhaps our failures
are due to some unknown polarity we have yet to discover."

lines.name: Usurper's Penance

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks have 15% chance to cause Bleeding
+4% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Bleeding per Frenzy Charge
Bleeding you inflict deals Damage 4% faster per Frenzy Charge
(20-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Critical Strike at Close Range

lines.flavourText: Bloodlust begets suffering.

lines.name: Scorpion's Call

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (24-27) Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate (150-200) Life per Second while in Blood Stance
(40-60)% increased Projectile Damage while in Blood Stance
+(700-1000) to Evasion Rating while in Sand Stance
(20-30)% increased Area of Effect while in Sand Stance
(25-30)% increased Attack Speed if you've changed Stance Recently

lines.flavourText: Claws open, brace for a bite. Stinger raised, dodge or die.

lines.name: The Formless Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Armour is increased by Overcapped Fire Resistance

lines.name: Repentance
lines.flavourText:
"I ask not for understanding,
only for forgiveness
for what I am about to do.
There will be blood on these shackles yet."
- Anonymous carving, Axiom Prison.

lines.name: Kitava's Thirst

explicitModifiers.text:
50% chance to Trigger Socketed Spells when you Spend at least 100 Mana on an
Upfront Cost to Use or Trigger a Skill, with a 0.1 second Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
Tukohama, Tawhoa and Kitava went to the lake to fish.
Tawhoa weaved a net to catch the fish,
Tukohama built a fire to cook the fish,
and Kitava swallowed the entire lake, fish and all, with a single gulp.

lines.name: Mutewind Whispersteps

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (25-30) to (40-50) Cold Damage to Spells

lines.flavourText:
Corruption sweeps across this land,
but our bloodline is clear.
It is our duty to keep it so.

lines.name: Saffell's Frame
lines.flavourText: A swift mind solves problems before they occur.

lines.name: Replica Alpha's Howl

explicitModifiers.text: +4 to Level of Socketed Herald Gems
16% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Test subject walked right through the poison gas defenses, and attempts to slow her
failed. Suppression troop six, the 'Furious Flagellants,' have been sent to intervene."

lines.name: Blood Price

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemy Monsters have at least 8% of Life Reserved

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye makes the whole world dead.

lines.name: Goldrim

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 4 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.

lines.name: Alberon's Warpath

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 80 Chaos Damage to Attacks

Summoned Skeleton Warriors are Permanent and Follow you
Summon Skeletons cannot Summon more than 1 Skeleton Warrior

lines.flavourText:
Alberon walked among the accursed,
and they welcomed him.

lines.name: Kaom's Roots

explicitModifiers.text: Action Speed cannot be modified to below Base Value

lines.flavourText: Don't flinch. It's a waste of good hitting time.

lines.name: Matua Tupuna

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
20% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills on your Minions
20% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText:
You carried me through life,
The least I can do is carry you through death.

lines.name: Three-step Assault

explicitModifiers.text: 30% chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments while Phasing

lines.flavourText:
Move in with haste.
Strike quick, strike hard.
Vanish like smoke in the wind.

lines.name: Titucius' Span

explicitModifiers.text: -(80-50) Physical Damage taken from Projectile Attacks
+25% chance to Block Projectile Attack Damage

lines.flavourText:
A mighty bulwark, curved and strong
A dauntless wall, against the throng
All lance and arrow, knocked aside
For rout of foe, for turn of tide.

lines.name: Redblade Banner
lines.flavourText: Blood shed is blood shared.

lines.name: Great Old One's Tentacles

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-12) to (15-20) Physical Damage to Attacks
(10-20)% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
50% chance for Impales on Enemies you Kill to Reflect Damage to surrounding Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Under its influence, shards of metal take on a life of their own, wriggling into flesh,
burrowing into organs, and exploding outwards in search of other victims.

lines.name: Maw of Conquest

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life

lines.flavourText:
Young Napuatzi was thrown into the pits, an unwilling sacrifice, 
but the offer of her blood was refused. 
She rose from the pit alive and anew.  
A Leader. A Conquerer. A Viper.

lines.name: Daresso's Courage

explicitModifiers.text: +30% Chance to Block Spell Damage while on Low Life
+100% Chance to Block Attack Damage if you have Blocked Spell Damage Recently
+100% chance to Block Spell Damage if you have Blocked Attack Damage Recently

lines.flavourText:
By tourney's end, Daresso bled and shivered.
Yet even accursed treachery failed to steal the champion's victory.

lines.name: Devoto's Devotion
lines.flavourText:
Swift as thought are the actions of Man 
when borne on wings of divine providence.

lines.name: Geofri's Crest

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Holy Relics

lines.flavourText:
In the battle for honour, Geofri won.
Not so, the battle for survival.

lines.name: Leer Cast

explicitModifiers.text: You and nearby allies gain 50% increased Damage

lines.flavourText: For none of us are as cruel as all of us.

lines.name: Leper's Alms

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies

lines.flavourText: One's burden is another's gift.

lines.name: Replica Mistwall

explicitModifiers.text: +(8-15)% chance to Avoid Physical Damage from Hits while Phasing
You have Phasing if you have Blocked Recently
You are at Maximum Chance to Block Spell Damage if you have not Blocked Recently

lines.flavourText:
"For personal defence, Prototype #444 is fantastic. It is one hundred percent
effective seventy five percent of the time... once." 
- Lead Researcher Ksaret

lines.name: The Poised Prism

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 2 Cold Damage to Attacks per 10 Dexterity
Adds 1 to 2 Fire Damage to Attacks per 10 Strength
Adds 0 to 3 Lightning Damage to Attacks per 10 Intelligence

lines.flavourText: What do you see when you look inward?

lines.name: The Ghastly Theatre

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Support Gems
Triggers Level 20 Physical Aegis when Equipped
(8-15)% increased Attack and Cast Speed while Physical Aegis is depleted
(50-70)% increased Critical Strike Chance while Physical Aegis is depleted
Nearby Enemies are Blinded while Physical Aegis is not depleted

lines.flavourText:
Never let the audience know your true form. Misdirect them,
beguile them. Strike when they least expect it.

lines.name: Soul Strike

implicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Critical Strike Chance with Bows

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (13-18) to (26-32) Chaos Damage to Attacks
80% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge

lines.flavourText:
In this chaotic world
The rewards of the Soul
Outlast the rewards of the Flesh.

lines.name: Heatshiver

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 1% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1% Chill Effect on Enemy
Gain 30% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage against Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Give of your heated passions.
Give of your cold resolve.
You will be repaid.

lines.name: Sadima's Touch

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

lines.name: Dendrobate

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Chance to Poison
(75-100)% increased Damage with Poison if you have at least 300 Dexterity
(15-25)% increased Poison Duration if you have at least 150 Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
Ask any tracker and they'll tell you:
the most dangerous animals
are the ones who don't bother to hide.

lines.name: Thrillsteel
lines.flavourText:
We may fight, and we may die, but in these
moments of blood and battle, we truly live.

lines.name: Kahuturoa's Certainty
lines.flavourText: Confidence is calm and measured.

lines.name: Vaal Caress

explicitModifiers.text: +5 to Level of Socketed Vaal Gems
-5 to Level of Socketed Non-Vaal Gems
You gain Onslaught for 20 seconds on using a Vaal Skill

lines.flavourText:
"The gems are strangely human at times.
They simply love to be held."
- Doryani, First Seer to the Queen

lines.name: Curtain Call

explicitModifiers.text: Skills which throw Mines throw up to 1 additional Mine if you have at least 800 Dexterity
Skills which throw Mines throw up to 1 additional Mine if you have at least 800 Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
Sing with me one last duet,
the curtain closes nigh.
Join me in a quiet song,
Before we all must die.

lines.name: Replica Eternity Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Shade Form when Hit
Gain (3-5)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per Elder Item Equipped
Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Elder Items

lines.flavourText:
"The form of this replica came to me in a troubled dream.
I do not believe we should ever allow it to be used."
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Allelopathy
lines.flavourText:
"Nothing is more natural than competition.
One feasts, another starves.
One blossoms, another withers.
And one cannot catch the golden sunlight
without casting a bitter shadow."
- Cadiro Perandus

lines.name: Aurseize
lines.flavourText: Wealth is not to be borne lightly.

lines.name: Vixen's Entrapment

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Socketed Curse Spell when you Cast a Curse Spell, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
0.2% of Spell Damage Leeched as Energy Shield for each Curse on Enemy
You can apply an additional Curse
Curse Skills have (10-20)% increased Cast Speed

lines.flavourText:
"One coy look. One blown kiss. One word spoken.
One night I wish I'd forget."

lines.name: Giantsbane

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-8) to (12-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The monstrous men of yore used bows too,
theirs were just bigger.

lines.name: Ancient Skull

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 50% increased Critical Strike Chance per Maximum Power Charge you have
Minions can hear the whispers for 5 seconds after they deal a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Primordial rage slumbers, waiting for the call
of the stars to return and swallow the world.

lines.name: Shavronne's Pace

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne raced to Brutus' side,
her last hope against the Karui tide.

lines.name: Veruso's Battering Rams

explicitModifiers.text: 4% increased Melee Damage per Endurance Charge
You cannot be Shocked while at maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
With unending determination and resolve he destroyed first the gates, 
then the constructs guarding the tomb on the other side.

lines.name: Victario's Influence

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Generosity
Socketed Gems have 45% increased Reservation Efficiency
(20-40)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
(10-15)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Every life is a story.
If you're not writing your own,
you'd better know who's writing it for you!"
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Sundance
lines.flavourText:
Blazing body, shining bold.
Dance beneath the orb of gold!

lines.name: Thousand Teeth Temu

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Reflects 1000 to 10000 Physical Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText:
Crimson burn'd the star of sadness,
All was woe that seem'd but gladness.

lines.name: Ashrend

explicitModifiers.text: (75-150)% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons
-(60-30) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

lines.name: Surgebinders

explicitModifiers.text: (4-7)% increased Elemental Damage per Frenzy Charge
(4-7)% increased Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
(4-7)% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
10% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit

lines.flavourText:
Your lies are our strength.
Your threats are our laughter.
Your hate is our infinity
The fire rises!

lines.name: Chernobog's Pillar

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (30-35) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
25% chance to Curse Non-Cursed Enemies with Enfeeble on Hit

lines.flavourText:
Fire dances with those who doubt
Licks the skin and flesh from the fearful
Where there is no fear
There is no flame

lines.name: Temptation Step

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Damage for each Poison on you up to a maximum of 75%
10% increased Movement Speed for each Poison on you up to a maximum of 50%

Poison you inflict with Travel Skills is Reflected to you if you
have fewer than 5 Poisons on you

lines.flavourText:
The High Priests ensured the loyalty of their slaves by habituating
them to narcotic stimulants with lethal withdrawals.

lines.name: Ambu's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Gain up to maximum Endurance Charges when you take a Critical Strike
Your nearby party members maximum Endurance Charges is equal to yours

lines.flavourText: Nothing stops the pain like a courageous rush into battle.

lines.name: Facebreaker

explicitModifiers.text: (600-800)% more Physical Damage with Unarmed Melee Attacks

lines.flavourText: Fly like a Storm Crow, crush like a Rhoa

lines.name: Greed's Embrace
lines.flavourText:
Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

lines.name: Malachai's Loop

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit
(12-16)% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Shocks you when you reach Maximum Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
Thaumaturgy has no limit.
It is our fragile reality that imposes boundaries.

lines.name: Shackles of the Wretched

explicitModifiers.text: Hexes applied by Socketed Curse Skills are Reflected back to you
You cannot be Chilled for 3 seconds after being Chilled
You cannot be Frozen for 3 seconds after being Frozen
You cannot be Ignited for 3 seconds after being Ignited
You cannot be Shocked for 3 seconds after being Shocked
You grant (4-6) Frenzy Charges to allies on Death

lines.flavourText: Captivity breeds creativity.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

explicitModifiers.text: 4% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate 75 Life per second per Endurance Charge
(100-200)% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: Fractal Thoughts

explicitModifiers.text: +(25-40)% to Critical Strike Multiplier if Dexterity is higher than Intelligence
15% increased Dexterity if Strength is higher than Intelligence

lines.flavourText:
"The more the warrior understood Tangmazu's gift, the less the mask aided him.
His dreams were filled with divine laughter."
- Tenth Song of the Islands

lines.name: Kiloava's Bluster

explicitModifiers.text: (30-40)% chance for Elemental Resistances to count as being 90% against Enemy Hits

lines.flavourText: Not even the storm knows when lightning will strike.

lines.name: Bloodbond

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have +(12-15)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage

lines.flavourText: What mother wouldn't give her life for that of her children?

lines.name: The Three Dragons

explicitModifiers.text: Your Fire Damage can Shock but not Ignite
Your Cold Damage can Ignite but not Freeze or Chill
Your Lightning Damage can Freeze but not Shock

lines.flavourText:
"The ice seared his naked feet
As the lightning stilled his heart,
But it was the flames upon his lover's face
That roused him to vengeance."
- From 'The Three Dragons' by Victario of Sarn

lines.name: Aukuna's Will

explicitModifiers.text: Raised Zombies have (80-100)% increased maximum Life
Raise Zombie does not require a corpse
Your Raised Zombies count as corpses

lines.flavourText: The Black Sekhema's trial had only just begun.

lines.name: Hrimnor's Resolve

explicitModifiers.text: 100% chance to Avoid being Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently

lines.flavourText:
Hrimnor's presence was as cold as ice,
but his heart burned for vengeance.

lines.name: Deerstalker

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Trap
15% increased Movement Speed for 9 seconds on Throwing a Trap

lines.flavourText: Anticipation, preparation, exhilaration, celebration.

lines.name: Malachai's Simula

explicitModifiers.text: Spells have a 20% chance to deal Double Damage

lines.flavourText:
It was a sliver of Malachai's soul
that animated the first Eternal Guardian.

lines.name: Wanderlust
lines.flavourText: All the world is my home.

lines.name: Darkray Vectors

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Evasion Rating per Frenzy Charge
5% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Sirrius flew on wings of light, faster than wind, faster
than thought. But try as he might to outrun the darkness,
it was there, at every turn, waiting for him."
- Azmerian legend

lines.name: Hrimsorrow

explicitModifiers.text: 100% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects 100 Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
Of ancient giants, none remain,
Their only trace is timeless pain.

lines.name: Great Old One's Ward

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-12) to (15-20) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The horrors we've encountered are nothing
compared to the horrors we haven't.

lines.name: Infernal Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
15% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
100% increased Spell Damage taken when on Low Mana

lines.flavourText:
Despair hums, softly, deadly, in the bones of my enemies. 
Eyes will burn, and souls wither, as they bask in my radiance.

lines.name: Mindspiral

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Maximum Mana as Extra Maximum Energy Shield
Enemies Cannot Leech Mana From you
(10-20)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana

lines.flavourText: Where top is bottom and weak is strong.

lines.name: The Bringer of Rain

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Melee Physical Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Faster Attacks
Socketed Gems are supported by Level 30 Blind
Adds 20 to 30 Physical Damage to Attacks
20% chance to gain an Endurance Charge when you Block

lines.flavourText:
"What lies beneath your feet?!"
"Sacred ground, watered with tears of blood!"

lines.name: Zahndethus' Cassock

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% chance to create Consecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
When dead men rise and darkness falls
Only faith can be your walls
Walls of Light, not of brick
Twice as strong and twice as thick

lines.name: Abyssus

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 40 to 60 Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
When you have slain all of your enemies,
what is left to fear?

lines.name: Shadows and Dust

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Creates a Smoke Cloud on Rampage
Gain Unholy Might for 3 seconds on Rampage

lines.flavourText:
What is fear but a snuffed torch
and death in the wind?

lines.name: Slitherpinch

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
A soft caress in dead of night,
that slips about the neck, so tight.

lines.name: Wyrmsign

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Concentrated Effect
4% reduced Mana Cost per Endurance Charge
Gain Rampage while at Maximum Endurance Charges
Lose all Endurance Charges when Rampage ends

lines.flavourText:
Those who witness the shimmering scales of the wyrm
know only fear for the rest of their lives.
Fortunately, the rest of their lives
can be measured in seconds.

lines.name: The Coming Calamity

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Herald Gems
35% chance to avoid being Stunned for each Herald Buff affecting you
Mana Reservation of Herald Skills is always 45%

lines.flavourText:
Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark.
Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm.
Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight.
By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

lines.name: Mark of the Red Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Summoned Raging Spirits deal (175-250)% increased Damage
75% reduced Maximum number of Summoned Raging Spirits
Summoned Raging Spirits' Hits always Ignite

Summoned Raging Spirits' Melee Strikes deal Fire-only Splash
Damage to Surrounding Targets

lines.flavourText:
Gleeful are the few
who bask in the blood of the many.

lines.name: Replica Three-step Assault

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Movement Speed if you've Hit an Enemy Recently

lines.flavourText:
"The test subject nearly escaped, but the poison gas
system in the hallway functioned as expected."

lines.name: Demon Stitcher

explicitModifiers.text: Sacrifice (5-25)% of Life to gain that much Energy Shield when you Cast a Spell

lines.flavourText:
Xibaqua's treachery was met with divine fury.
One by one, the gods reclaimed their flesh,
until all that remained was a droplet of pure light:
The first Vaal.

lines.name: Eye of Malice

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to inflict Cold Exposure on Hit
25% chance to inflict Fire Exposure on Hit
Nearby Enemies have 50% increased Fire and Cold Resistances

lines.flavourText:
Through vision coloured by burning rage and icy hate
peers a visitor from a realm of ill intent...

lines.name: Blackgleam

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (24-27) Fire Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
5 to 10 Added Fire Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Molten feathers, veiled spark,
Hissing arrows from the dark.

lines.name: Willclash

explicitModifiers.text: +5% Chance to Block Spell Damage per Power Charge
(3-5)% increased Elemental Damage per Power charge
Gain a Power Charge every Second if you haven't lost Power Charges Recently
Lose all Power Charges when you Block

lines.flavourText: Obtaining information depends upon pretending one already has it.

lines.name: Tanu Ahi

explicitModifiers.text: (2-3)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

10% chance to gain Adrenaline for 2 Seconds when Leech is
removed by Filling Unreserved Life

10% chance to gain Onslaught for 4 Seconds when Leech is
removed by Filling Unreserved Life

lines.flavourText:
There is no greater thrill than leaping into combat,
slashing and hewing with utmost abandon.

lines.name: Stormseeker

explicitModifiers.text: (60-100)% increased Effect of Chills you inflict while Leeching Mana
(60-100)% increased Effect of Shocks you inflict while Leeching Energy Shield
Unaffected by Chill while Leeching Mana
Unaffected by Shock while Leeching Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The fundamental forces of our world are secrets
to be uncovered by the intelligent and the capable.
Like all secrets, they, too, can be stolen.

lines.name: Crown of Thorns

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 5 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
+25 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
Lift it lightly, don it slow.
The spikes point out and in, you know.

lines.name: Wake of Destruction

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 120 Lightning Damage to Attacks
Drops Shocked Ground while moving, lasting 2 seconds

lines.flavourText:
Tempest's power given form,
Flee before the walking storm.

lines.name: Elevore

explicitModifiers.text: Recover (100-200) Life when you Suppress Spell Damage

lines.flavourText:
Ancient worshippers of the Greatwolf were overtaken
by a ravenous hunger for all things mystical.

lines.name: Orbala's Stand

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be Stunned by Suppressed Spell Damage
Debilitate Enemies for 4 Seconds when you Suppress their Spell Damage

lines.flavourText:
The inferno surged past, devastating Stridevolf, but the Maraketh
warrior somehow remained. Soot-blackened and resolute, she
grinned. In that moment, the bandit king knew true despair.

lines.name: Empire's Grasp

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Knockback

lines.flavourText:
"I like my vassals at sword point,
but my enemies as close as the hilt."
- Emperor Chitus

lines.name: Gang's Momentum

explicitModifiers.text: (25-40)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Ignited Enemies

lines.flavourText: Become one with the unstoppable flame.

lines.name: Sentari's Answer

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Punishment when you Block their Melee Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains when you Block their Projectile Attack Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness when you Block their Spell Damage, ignoring Curse Limit

lines.flavourText:
Open your eyes and you will see the cracks in your enemy's walls.
Open your mind and you will see the cracks in your enemy's plans.

lines.name: Sin Trek

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies Cannot Leech Life From you

lines.flavourText: Do not let them step on your feet. Keep them at bay.

lines.name: Snakebite

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
6% increased Accuracy Rating per Frenzy Charge
10% reduced Frenzy Charge Duration per Frenzy Charge
Attacks have 60% chance to Poison while at maximum Frenzy Charges
+5% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Poison per Frenzy Charge

lines.flavourText:
"As the serpent shuns thought,
It shuns fear.
It strikes with the speed of wrath
And the skill of compulsion."
- Deshret, The Red Sekhema

lines.name: Kalisa's Grace

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 18 Faster Casting
Gain +2% to Critical Strike Chance for 2 seconds after Spending a total of 800 Mana

lines.flavourText:
"You shall hang, in blissful agony, on my every note."
- Kalisa, Prima Donna of Sarn

lines.name: Ghostwrithe

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Maximum Life Converted to Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: Faith springs abundant at the edge of death.

lines.name: Bones of Ullr

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Raise Zombie Gems
+1 to Level of all Raise Spectre Gems

lines.flavourText:
The dead man walks where
the living fear to tread.

lines.name: Skullhead

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have +25% Chance to Block Attack Damage
Minions have +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage
Minions Recover 10% of their Life when they Block

lines.flavourText:
All that was left of the Iron King was his bleached skull.
Yet it was all the Iron King needed.

lines.name: Southbound

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (60-72) to (88-100) Cold Damage to Attacks
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

lines.name: The Deep One's Hide

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 8 Physical Damage to Attacks
Adds 12 to 15 Cold Damage to Attacks
Curse Enemies with Vulnerability on Block

lines.flavourText:
The thicker the shell,
the greater the beast that hunts it.

lines.name: Rearguard

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-9) to (13-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"It's a rare man that has eyes in the back of his head."
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

lines.name: Veruso's Ambition
lines.flavourText:
"Follow me if you desire better for yourself, and for your
families. Follow me if you hunger for more than this!"

lines.name: Chitus' Apex
lines.flavourText:
"It takes true strength to hold power,
and my grip grows tighter by the day."
 - Emperor Chitus

lines.name: Craghead

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 6 to 10 Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText: Hit them hard. Hit them once.

lines.name: Flesh and Spirit

explicitModifiers.text: Kills grant an additional Vaal Soul if you have Rampaged Recently

lines.flavourText:
What is greed but trading a mountain of death
for a sliver of life?

lines.name: Nomic's Storm

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Damage taken while on Full Energy Shield
20% increased Movement Speed while on Full Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: It takes a clear mind to outrun a storm.

lines.name: Null and Void

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Immunity to Physical Damage for 1.5 seconds on Rampage

lines.flavourText:
What is freedom but a clean slate
in an unclean world?

lines.name: Skirmish

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Attack Skills have +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems

lines.flavourText:
If two great leaders like Lioneye and Kaom
had been on the same side of the battle,
nothing would remain unconquered.

lines.name: Zeel's Amplifier

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Area of Effect per Enemy killed recently, up to 50%
You have Zealot's Oath if you haven't been hit recently

lines.flavourText:
"Great minds wish to reveal all the secrets of time and space.
But it does not matter. Creation, the act of Matter Metamorphosis, 
is the only secret worth discovering." 
- Zeel, Vaal Tinkerer

lines.name: Triad Grip

explicitModifiers.text: Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Fire Damage per Red Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Cold Damage per Green Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Lightning Damage per Blue Socket
Minions convert 25% of Physical Damage to Chaos Damage per White Socket
Minions have (5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite

lines.flavourText: The secret of the elements lies within a square triangle.

lines.name: Kongming's Stratagem

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Fog of War when your Trap is triggered
(30-50)% increased Fire Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies
30% reduced Spell Damage taken from Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered.
Those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid. 
Thus the wise win before they fight, 
while the ignorant fight to win.

lines.name: Hyrri's Bite

implicitModifiers.text: Gain (6-8) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Cold Damage to Attacks
Gain (2-3) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
A Karui woman's place was not the 
battlefield, but the hearth.
Hyrri changed all of that.

lines.name: Rat's Nest
lines.flavourText:
A lad with no fear of the pest 
Let rats fill his helmet in jest 
When they picked his skull clean
Where his head should have been
Was naught but a vermin-filled nest!

lines.name: Stormcharger
lines.flavourText: Like lightning, the Ezomyte cavalry need never strike twice.

lines.name: Black Sun Crest
lines.flavourText:
The beasts we fear the most
are the ones who dwell in total darkness.

lines.name: Bronn's Lithe

explicitModifiers.text: +5 to Level of Socketed Movement Gems

lines.flavourText:
Forget your kite shield. Just put the biggest man
 in the field between you and the archers.

lines.name: Chalice of Horrors

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
100% Chance to Cause Monster to Flee on Block
+20% Chance to Block Attack Damage from Cursed Enemies
Inflict Decay on Enemies you Curse with Hex Skills, dealing 700 Chaos Damage per Second for 8 Seconds

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye. A curse for a curse.

lines.name: Drillneck

explicitModifiers.text: (10-14) to (19-24) Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
Arrows deal 50% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments to Targets they Pierce

lines.flavourText:
"Why waste such a fine arrow on just one man?" 
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

lines.name: Dusktoe

explicitModifiers.text: +50% to Chaos Resistance during any Flask Effect
Adds (30-40) to (50-60) Chaos Damage to Spells and Attacks during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"A lick of shadow may ease 
the petty frictions of one's life."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Foxshade

explicitModifiers.text: +1000 to Evasion Rating while on Full Life
30% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Full Life

lines.flavourText: To catch an animal, think like an animal.

lines.name: Goldwyrm
lines.flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

lines.name: Icetomb

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Freeze Enemies for 1 second when they Hit you

lines.flavourText:
When Solaris closes her burning eye
At the end of time,
the world will perish in ice.

lines.name: Kaltenhalt

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Reflects (25-50) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: Cold, miserable and alone... but alive.

lines.name: Lightbane Raiment

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Reflects 30 Chaos Damage to Melee Attackers
100% chance to create Desecrated Ground when you Block

lines.flavourText:
. . . and the Light faded and hope waned
Zahndethus cast aside his faith
and embraced the darkness.

lines.name: Lioneye's Paws

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 5 Rain of Arrows when you Attack with a Bow
Adds 12 to 24 Fire Damage to Attacks
40% reduced Movement Speed when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
Stand and lead the righteous pride,
Fight till death, never hide.

lines.name: Lochtonial Caress

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% chance to gain a Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Why cling to your sanity? It offers you nothing.
Surrender to me, and I will grant you everything.

lines.name: Maligaro's Lens

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby allies Recover 1% of your Maximum Life when you Die

lines.flavourText:
"Look around you. What do you see? 
Corruption, perversion, sin?
No. It is progress. 
You simply lack the means to see it." 
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Ondar's Clasp

explicitModifiers.text: 30% increased Attack Speed when on Full Life
Adds (1-4) to (30-50) Lightning Damage to Attacks
20% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
A single lightning strike fells a man.
A single knife stroke fells an empire.

lines.name: Solaris Lorica

explicitModifiers.text: 25% reduced Chaos Damage taken over time
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Give me neither havens nor solace;
They are for the weak and frightened.
Instead, light the path to greatness,
So that I may begin my bright pursuit.

lines.name: Springleaf

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 100 Life per Second while on Low Life

lines.flavourText: From death springs life.

lines.name: Trolltimber Spire

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Area of Effect for Skills used by Totems
0.5% of Damage dealt by your Totems is Leeched to you as Life
You and your Totems Regenerate 0.5% of Life per second for each Summoned Totem

lines.flavourText:
The problem with working fresh trolltimber:
by the time you've carved out one end, 
the other has sprouted fresh roots!

lines.name: Veil of the Night

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 1 to (180-220) Lightning Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText:
The seeds of greatness are planted in darkness,
Watered by suffering,
Tended by desperation,
And bloom steel flowers of victory.

lines.name: Victario's Charity

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
10% chance to grant a Power Charge to nearby Allies on Kill
5% chance to grant a Frenzy Charge to nearby Allies on Hit

lines.flavourText: A man's life is the greatest gift he can give.

lines.name: Victario's Flight

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
Quicksilver Flasks you Use also apply to nearby Allies

lines.flavourText:
Alive but not unscathed, Victario fled
as slaughter blossomed at the gates.

lines.name: Voidbringer

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Elemental Gems
Gain (15-20) Energy Shield per Enemy Killed
Lose (40-80) Mana when you use a Skill

lines.flavourText: Absolute corruption empowers absolutely.

lines.name: Wondertrap

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Rarity of Items found when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Wonders abound at death's door.

lines.name: The Baron

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
Half of your Strength is added to your Minions
+1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies per 500 Strength
With at least 1000 Strength, (1.5-2)% of Damage dealt by your Raised Zombies is Leeched to you as Life

lines.flavourText:
"The Emperor's trusted surgeons are not the only ones who 
practice the dark arts. Some of us are just more discreet."

lines.name: The Embalmer

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Vile Toxins

lines.flavourText:
"Decomposition takes hold too quickly!
No, if we are to keep the specimen in perfect shape,
we must begin the process before expiry."

lines.name: Oskarm

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Assassin's Mark when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy and have no Mark
2% increased Attack Critical Strike Chance per 200 Accuracy Rating

lines.flavourText:
Land and sea did not dissuade,
nor did the Kelpie's maw;
the wild beast crossed half the world
to sate his hungry claw.

lines.name: The Eternal Apple

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Warcry Skill on losing Endurance Charges, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
You lose all Endurance Charges on reaching maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
The empire is both the tree and the fruit.
It provides safe harbour as ideas grow within,
and when the time is right, the apple is picked. 
The idea, and our ideals, take root.

lines.name: Torchoak Step

explicitModifiers.text: Totems Reflect 100% of their maximum Life as Fire Damage to nearby Enemies when Hit

lines.flavourText:
Centuries ago, there existed a unique grove imbued with ancestral fire.
As with all things, the Karui used its wood for war.

lines.name: Saemus' Gift
lines.flavourText:
Beaten in contest, he would try once more
Guided by magic, Magjar took aim at a dove
Saemus' gift would influence the score
Guided by darkness, Magjar spilled the blood of his love

lines.name: Asphyxia's Wrath

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies within 3 metres when Hexed Enemy dies

lines.flavourText:
Mist of breath
Icing to lips and throat
As the warm ones choke and fall
Upon the frozen wasteland.

lines.name: Maloney's Nightfall

implicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

explicitModifiers.text: (8-10) to (14-16) Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
25% chance to create a Smoke Cloud when Hit
(40-60)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Fear not the dark, the song of night,
Hear not the arch, the falling cry.
My giving sun, fight no more,
Rest alone, my grand nightfall.

lines.name: Briskwrap
lines.flavourText:
"I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity
of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen
